## Source: ossf-package-analysis (85f2baa5c5673490af93199349e0ef54f7c581115b1fa83d6df2c9e18430e031)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ngf-gov-hr-navbar' @ 0.2.20 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
